name: Ext_R5_List_source
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.List.source for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents List.source from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/List|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Who and/or what defined the list contents (aka Author)
element.definition: The entity responsible for deciding what the contents of the list were. Where the list was created by a human, this is the same as the author of the list.
element.comment: `List.source` maps to R4B `List.source`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Organization)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/RelatedPerson)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CareTeam)` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
